item.title: Release 1.0.4
item.description: On June 8, 2019, Anarchy Linux received its 1.0.4 release, finally. With the upcoming release of 1.0.5, which already has way more changes, we can safely say this was a minor release, Changelog: QT4 was removed from the package list MongoDB was removed from the optional software list A timeout was added to the syslinux config file arch-wiki-cli was removed from the package list
